short.am,ar,de,el,en,en_AU,en_GB,en_US,es,es_4: The simplest way to identify fonts on web pages.
short.bg: Най-лесният начин да идентифицирате шрифтове на уеб страници
short.bn: ওয়েব পৃষ্ঠাগুলিতে ফন্টগুলি সনাক্ত করার সবচেয়ে সহজ উপায়
short.ca: La manera més senzilla d'identificar les fonts a les pàgines web
short.cs: Nejjednodušší způsob, jak identifikovat písma na webových stránkách
short.da: Den enkleste måde at identificere skrifttyper på websider
short.te: వెబ్ పేజీలలో ఫాంట్‌లను గుర్తించడానికి సులభమైన మార్గం
short.zh_CN: 识别网页上字体的最简单方法

long.am,ar,de,el,en,en_AU,en_GB,en_US,es,es_4:
Name: Font Identifier

Description: Font Identifier is the simplest way to identify fonts on web pages. This Chrome extension allows you to effortlessly capture and display font information directly from your screen, making it an invaluable tool for designers, developers, and font enthusiasts.

Key Features:
Capture Screen Fonts: Easily capture font details by clicking on any text element on a webpage.
Detailed Font Information: View comprehensive details including font name, size, weight, and color.
User-Friendly Interface: Enjoy a clean and intuitive interface that makes font identification quick and straightforward.
No Data Collection: We respect your privacy and do not collect, store, or share any personal information.

How It Works:
1. Install the Extension: Add Font Identifier to your Chrome browser.
2. Activate the Tool: Click the Font Identifier icon in the toolbar.
3.Identify Fonts: Hover over and click on any text to see the font details in a pop-up window.

Ideal For:
Web Designers: Quickly identify fonts used on any webpage for design inspiration and consistency.
Frontend Developers: Easily gather font information to use in your own web projects.
Font Enthusiasts: Discover and collect details about your favorite fonts while browsing.

Permissions Explanation:
activeTab Permission: Allows the extension to access the content of the currently active tab when the user interacts with the extension, essential for identifying and displaying font information.
scripting Permission: Enables the extension to inject scripts into the current web page, necessary for retrieving and analyzing font details directly from the page's content.

Font Identifier makes font identification effortless and efficient. Install it today and enhance your web browsing experience with instant access to font information.
